MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Hale Village, affecting properties in Arklow Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.55am. Our engineers are at the local substation to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.20am on 27th of Feb 2021.
